ISSUE.TITLE: Dragon C207 info outdated.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Capsule `5f6f99fddcfdf403df379709` represents outdated information. Firstly, a wrong count of `water_landings`. It is currently showing 1, but after Insipration4 splashed down it should increase to 2 (Crew-1 and Inspiration4 water landings). Also the `last_update` value seems a little off. It refers to Crew-1 splashdown which happened in May and not Inspiration4. Reuse count and a launches list are fine. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/77860645/140494064-ead07b13-e139-4003-97aa-0b5dd9104d0c.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #939 from r-spacex/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/pino-7.0.5 Bump pino from 7.0.3 to 7.0.5
